headline: Bank of America (BAC) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider
summary: The latest trading day saw Bank of America (BAC) settling at $44.38, representing a +1.12% change from its previous close.

headline: Bank lobbyists sue Fed over stress test transparency
summary: The Federal Reserve faces a legal challenge from a group of banking industry lobbyists, including the Bank Policy Institute and the US Chamber of Commerce. The consortium alleges that the central bank is violating federal law by not allowing public input on its stress test process, a requirement that is legally mandated. Yahoo Finance Senior Fed Reporter Jennifer Schonberger examines the purpose of these stress tests and analyzes how the central bank is addressing the controversy. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: OCC issues cease and desist order against Bank of America for BSA deficiencies
summary: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency has issued a cease-and-desist order against Bank of America (BAC) for deficiencies related to its Bank Secrecy Act and sanctions compliance programs. The OCC says it took this action based on violations and unsafe or unsound practices relating to these programs, including a failure to timely file suspicious activity reports and failure to correct a previously identified deficiency related to its Customer Due Diligence processes. headline: Bank of America Settles With OCC Over Anti-Money Laundering Concerns
summary: BAC receives a cease-and-desist order from the OCC considering the shortcomings under the Bank Secrecy Act. The bank agrees to take requisite remedial measures.

raw.headline: Bank of America Settles With OCC Over Anti-Money Laundering Concerns

headline: Banks Sue Federal Reserve Over ‘Lack of Transparency’ in Stress Testing
summary: The Fed on Monday said it planned to overhaul the stress-test regime for banks and planned to seek public comment on planned changes.

raw.headline: Banks Sue Federal Reserve Over ‘Lack of Transparency’ in Stress Testing
